amendment.description: At the end of division F (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. XX. For "Health Resources and Services Administration--Maternal and Child Health" ***.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 175 printed in House Report 115-297 to provide $5 million for grants that enhance infant and early childhood mental health promotion, intervention, and treatment programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A149) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Murphy (PA) amendment (A149) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A149) offered by Mr. Murphy (PA).
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
